channel.title: Tweaking my PK-Point System :P
channel.description: i have working pk points in my server (demise pking, delta) and i believe its set up in the way that a certain shop is given the "system" and then the items are given values for kills, like 2, 5, etc. i took my donar shop and switched it (non donars can go in and donars cant lol) and it has a pvp values like the pk shop. it says kills too, like "this item cost #$%#@!#$ kills." instead of coins, so thats step one. i put the pvp value "item #### == 2" (<-- example) but when you click the item to see the value, it just takes the value of a working one that you clicked before. how could i make it stable? if you need any more info feel free to tell me, i tried my best atm explaining this :p

item.title: Tweaking my PK-Point System :P
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

i have working pk points in my server (demise pking, delta) and i believe its set up in the way that a certain shop is given the “system” and then the items are given values for kills, like 2, 5, etc. i took my donar shop and switched it (non donars can go in and donars cant lol) and it has a pvp values like the pk shop. it says kills too, like “this item cost #$%#@!#$ kills.” instead of coins, so thats step one. i put the pvp value “item #### == 2” (<-- example) but when you click the item to see the value, it just takes the value of a working one that you clicked before. how could i make it stable? if you need any more info feel free to tell me, i tried my best atm explaining this
